Interface which define a plugin manager.

Adds a plugin to the manager.

The path to the plugin.

DoNeedARestart()

Gets a boolean indicating if a restart is needed.

Returns

bool

True if the application must be restarted false otherwise.

GetAllPlugins()

Gets all loaded plugins.

IEnumerable<Plugin> GetAllPlugins()

Returns

IEnumerable<Plugin>

A collection of loaded plugins.

RemovePlugin(Plugin)

Removes the specified plugin from the manager. As an assembly can't be removed during execution, the plugin will be disabled only after a re-run.

void RemovePlugin(Plugin plugin)

Parameters

plugin Plugin

The plugin to remove.
